title: Ride Concepts Hellion Elite flat pedal shoe delivers 4.0 Max grip in lowtop form
content:
Ride Concepts is back with another new pair of kicks. Shortly after the launch of the more casual looking Vice Mid, the new RC Hellion Elite is here to cover your all-mountain flat pedal needs. Citing consumer demand, the Hellion Elite is RC’s first lowtop shoe to use their DST 4.0 Max Grip rubber outsole. […]

The post Ride Concepts Hellion Elite flat pedal shoe delivers 4.0 Max grip in lowtop form appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
